author: S1518XBerics
title: Business trip that became pleasure at the Park Hyatt -
text: Superb hotel experience, the staff was beyond comparison, the room was exceptional, cocktails and dinner at the bar was perfect. Will return when the new restaurant opens next month. This hotel has the potential to be the best in the city.
